title: Epic Games wins monopoly case against Google
description:
In a landmark decision, the jury in the Epic Games vs Google case has unanimously ruled that Google Play and the Play Billing service constitute an illegal monopoly. The verdict comes three years after Epic Games initiated legal action against both Apple and Google, accusing them of maintaining unlawful app store monopolies. The jury –... Read more »

The post Epic Games wins monopoly case against Google appeared first on Developer Tech News.
